สรุปการทายผล วันนี้
SELECT memberID,matchID FROM playgame WHERE matchID!='GETPOINT' AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_create) >= '1477544400' AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_create) <= '1477630799' AND matchID!='GETPOINT' GROUP BY memberID ORDER BY code DESC ;
